notification.title: Security Plugin
notification.message: Please update the security plugin to the latest version

general.description: Fixes known issues in older Shopware versions
general.noFixes: Your system is protected against all known vulnerabilities.
general.alert: Caution, these are important security fixes for your shop! Deactivating one or more of these will make your shop vulnerable to these security gaps. Be sure what you are doing when deactivating any of the options and consider doing so only temporarily.

NEXT-9175.label: NEXT-9175 - Authenticated Server Side Request Forgery

NEXT-9569.label: NEXT-9569 - Session hijacking vulnerability of customer accounts in the storefront

NEXT-9689.label: NEXT-9689 - Authenticated Server Side Request Forgery

NEXT-10624.label: NEXT-10624 - Escape html in storefront search to prevent XSS

NEXT-10909.label: NEXT-10909 - Prevent invalid state in http cache

NEXT-10905.label: NEXT-10905 - Prevent loading of external entities while parsing xml

NEXT-12230.label: NEXT-12230 - Prevent changing passwords of other administration users

NEXT-12359.label: NEXT-12359 - Require authentication for documents and order with deeplink

NEXT-13371.label: NEXT-13371 - Certain fields are no longer displayed in the store API

NEXT-13247.label: NEXT-13247 - Reduce impact of store context token leak through reduced token validity

NEXT-12824.label: NEXT-12824 - Require authentication for documents in administration

NEXT-13664.label: NEXT-13664 - Invalidate php session on every logout

NEXT-14482.label: NEXT-14482 - Leak of information via Store-API

NEXT-15183.label: NEXT-15183 - Prevent cancelling of orders not related to the logged-in user

NEXT-14744.label: NEXT-14744 - CLI command to fix visibility setting of objects in S3 storage

NEXT-14871.label: NEXT-14871 - Fix encoding of associations in admin-api

NEXT-14883.label: NEXT-14883 - Prevent non-admin users from creating integrations with administrator role

NEXT-15669.label: NEXT-15669 - Fix command injection in mail agent

NEXT-15673.label: NEXT-15673 - Prevent URL file uploads from local IPv6 addresses

NEXT-16429.label: NEXT-16429 - Filter hidden reviews from product store-api endpoint

NEXT-19276.label: NEXT-19276 - Remove HTML code from promotion / product not found flashes

NEXT-19820.label: NEXT-19820 - Automatically invalidate sessions upon password change

NEXT-20309.label: NEXT-20309 - Fix cache control header for systems without cache proxy

NEXT-20348.label: NEXT-20348 - Fix session cookie gets cached

NEXT-20305.label: NEXT-20305 - Restrict Admin API proxy route for switching customer

NEXT-21034.label: NEXT-21034 - Prevent Cart ACL bypass via Admin-API prepared context

NEXT-23325.label: NEXT-23325 - Prevent duplicate product line items circumventing stock limitation

NEXT-23464.label: NEXT-23464 - Fix security issue in the twig template engine

NEXT-22891.label: NEXT-22891 - Fix double opt-in option on Newsletter Subscribe Route

NEXT-24667.label: NEXT-24667 - Fix remote code execution in twig template engine

NEXT-23562.label: NEXT-23562 - Fix twig template engine security issue

NEXT-24679.label: NEXT-24679 - Remove critical logs in mail

NEXT-26140.label: NEXT-24679 - Improve twig template engine security issue

PPI-737.label: PPI-737 - Prevent PayPal payment data manipulation
PPI-737.tooltip: This fix will only be activated, if you have the Shopware PayPal plugin <5.4.4 installed.
